title: Logging Library
rationale: TypeScript-native with full type safety, zero dependencies, structured JSON logging, pretty console output, minimal config, tree-shakeable

title: TypeScript Strict Mode
rationale: Catches bugs at compile time, enforces explicit types, prevents implicit any

title: Dead Code Detection
decision: Knip for finding unused files, dependencies, and exports
rationale: Modern comprehensive tool for detecting dead code, finds unused files/dependencies/exports/types, excellent monorepo and React support, integrates with TypeScript project references, configurable via knip.json, supports barrel file entry points for public APIs

title: AI-Focused CLI Design
decision: JSON output by default with self-describing interfaces
rationale: Following AI-focused CLI best practices: JSON output by default for machine consumption, structured error responses with HTTP-style codes, self-describing interfaces via --api-version/--schema/--list-commands, semantic exit codes (0=success, 1=user error, 2=system error), human-friendly output as opt-in via --format=text|table, non-interactive operation for CI/CD and AI agents
